input.sentences: my great grandfather is a hoarder .
i went over to help him clean .
most of the clutter was cleared out .
output.sentences: Once we came in we finally met her grandfather the hoarder.
His house was cluttered and way too dirty matching with the mess.
I spoke to him about trying to keep his home clean and to make it look nicer.
Overall the hallway was pretty presentable and nice.
I am very pleased he decided to let our team clean up all of his clutter.
